metadatahelp: Select an inscription to see its metadata
creator: Creator
help-text-iiif: Scroll to zoom in and out. Click and drag to pan the view.
help-text-short:
Double-click to focus. Click and drag to pan.
Right-click and drag to rotate (long-press on touch screen).
help-text:
Double-click to focus. Click and drag to pan.
Right-click and drag to rotate. Scroll to zoom in and out.
If available, use the arrows at the top to browse between alternative models.
help-text-sequence:
Scroll to zoom in and out. Click and drag to pan the view.
If available, use the arrows at the top to browse between different analytical layers.
frame-object:
Frame object.

Changes the view to the original position.
colour-toggle:
Color toggle.

Switches on or off the 3D model's color information. With the colors off and the light in the right direction, details will appear in higher contrast.
specular-toggle:
Specular toggle.

Switches on or off the 3D model's specular reflection. Switch off for a more neutral appearance.
light-tool:
Light tool.

Switches on or off the light controls. When activated, click and drag to enhance details. Deactivate the light controls to rotate the 3D model.
measure-tool:
Measure tool.

Switches on or off the ruler. When activated, click on two places to measure the distance between them.
annotate-instructions: Annotate. Annotate the image by holding shift-key while clicking and dragging a rectangle around the desired area.
annotate-instructions-2:
Hold shift and click-and-drag to mark
the section you wish to annotate.
satisfiedwithselection: Are you satisfied with the selection?
openlime-help-text: Browse available RTI-sets with the menu at the top. Activate light controls and click and drag to change light direction.
openlime-help-text-2:
Browse available RTI-sets with the menu at the top. Click and drag to pan the view.
Activate light controls and click and drag to change light direction.
shaderlayers:
Shader layers. Switch between

Light, Diffuse, Specular,

and

Normal

layers to enhance different details.
line-tool: Line tool. Activates the line tool. Click again to erase all lines.
pointcloud-instructions:
Click and drag to change direction. Move with WASD-
or Arrow-keys, or Double-click. Right-click and drag to pan.
Use the sliders to adjust the look and density of the pointcloud.
pointcloud-instructions-2:
Click and drag to change direction. Move with WASD-
or Arrow-keys, or Double-click. Right-click and drag to pan.
Use the sliders to adjust the look and density of the pointcloud.
distance-tool:
Measure tool.

Use to measure distances. Click to place measure points, and right-click to finish.
height-tool:
Height tool.

Use to measure the height between two points. Click to place measure points.
radius-tool:
Radius tool.

Use to measure the radius of a circle. Place two measure points by clicking and then adjust the shape by moving the pointer. Click when done.
clear:
Clear.

Clear away all measurements in the scene.
annotationstoggle: Annotations toggle. Switches on and off the annotations.
